attributes.action: make a skate park in weymouth
attributes.additional_details: Don't you think there should be a skate park in Weymouth? it will be a way to change the way people perceive '' youthful pests ''.this could be a great way for youth to perfect there skill and tricks. the age range that i'm aiming to influence

rejection.details: One to ask the local council about, and perhaps involve your MP?
